DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety AZD7009 Treatment Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Clinical indication cardioversion Atrial Fibrillation . Effective oral anticoagulation accord local routine TEE without find intracardial thrombus sign thrombogenecity Clinically significant sinus and/or AV node dysfunction . Serum plasma potassium < 3.8 mmol/L > 5.0 mmol/L . QTc ( Bazett ) > 450 ms. Any QRS duration > 150 m
